title: Texas Storm Fallout Continues | Sharon McMahon
itunes:title: Texas Storm Fallout Continues | Sharon McMahon
description:
Trevor covers the ongoing Texas storm crisis, Michael Kosta investigates avian election fraud, and Sharon McMahon talks about fighting misinformation via her Instagram account SharonSaysSo.


To help fight food insecurity in Texas resulting from recent snowstorms, go to dailyshow.com/HoustonFoodBank.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
